definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] limping, stumbling;—fig. of calamity, abs. ´[[לְח]] Ps 38:18  I am ready ([[נׇכוֹן]]) for stumbling (and falling); sf. [[בְּחַלְעִי]] Ps 35:15 at my stumbliing; ´[[שׁׂמְרֵי ח]] Je 20:10 watchers of my stumbling; [[אֵיד נׇכוֹן לְחַלְעוֹ]] Job 18:12 ruin is ready for his stumbling.-Vid. also [[חֵלָע]] cstr.
